org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.raft

Interface ConfigParams

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConfigParamsImpl, ExampleConfigParamsImpl

    public interface ConfigParams
    Configuration Parameter interface for configuring the Raft consensus system

    Any component using this implementation might want to provide an implementation of this interface to configure A default implementation will be used if none is provided.

    Author:
    Kamal Rameshan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration getElectionTimeOutInterval()
      The interval in which a new election would get triggered if no leader is found Normally its set to atleast twice the heart beat interval
      int getElectionTimeVariance()
      The maximum election time variance.
      scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration getHeartBeatInterval()
      The interval at which a heart beat message will be sent to the remote RaftActor
      scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration getIsolatedCheckInterval()
      The interval in which the leader needs to check itself if its isolated
      int getJournalRecoveryLogBatchSize()
      The number of journal log entries to batch on recovery before applying.
      long getSnapshotBatchCount()
      The minimum number of entries to be present in the in-memory Raft log for a snapshot to be taken
      int getSnapshotChunkSize()
      The size (in bytes) of the snapshot chunk sent from Leader
      int getSnapshotDataThresholdPercentage()
      The percentage of total memory in the in-memory Raft log before a snapshot is to be taken
